mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT SUM(DISTINCT T2.total) OVER(partition by to_char(T2.a_date, 'YY/MM')) AS total ,to_char(T2.a_date, 'YY/MM') as a_date ,T2.total as tradetotal ,T2.trade_id ,T2.age FROM su_users T1 INNER JOIN(SELECT DISTINCT SUM(amount) OVER(PARTITION BY trade_id, Ta.age,to_char(a_date, 'YY/MM')) AS total , id ,a_date ,trade_id ,amount ,Ta.age FROM ( SELECT TT.a_date ,TT.amount ,TT.id ,TT.trade_id ,T3.age FROM su_accounts TT INNER JOIN(SELECT id ,TRUNC(FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,TO_DATE(birth,'YYYYMMDD'))/12)+1,-1) AS age FROM su_users) T3 ON T3.id = TT.id AND to_date(TT.a_date,'YY/MM/DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(LAST_DAY(#{pageNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR})+1,-1),'YYYYMMDD'),'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(last_day(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(#{pageSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'YYYYMMDD')),'YY/MM/DD') ) Ta ) T2 ON T1.id = T2.id AND T2.age = #{searchWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
